attributes.additional_details: With the Government bringing in 'Payment by Results' across the board for Criminal Justice, Social Service and Benefits departments, should the MP''s themselves not be under this scheme? If they don't achieve the successful  completions or results that are demanded on them as people who serve this country, why should they not be as affected as everyone else who is working in these sectors?

rejection.details:
Removed at request of petitioner.

Please ensure any ne e-petition is submitted to 'Office of the Leader of the House of Commons'
